item.title: Updating a Rust Project to Latest Dependencies
item.description:
I recently updated an older Rust project (termdex, a terminal-based Pok√©dex) to use the latest package versions. Here’s what I ran into and how I fixed it.

The Starting Point

The project was using older versions of most dependencies:
